dublin_core.dcvalue: A mobile application that provides education on malaria diagnosis and treatment using celebrity branded mass-media campaigns. The program uses tools, ringtones, messages and quizzes to spread malaria knowledge & messages in a user-driven way.
community members, Clinics,district managers, Facility-Based Health care worker, National health system
Hannah Bowen, Director of Research & Strategy, Malaria No More, Email: Hannah.Bowen@malarianomore.org | Frances Gonzales, Program Associate, mHealth Alliance, Email: fgonzales@mhealthalliance.org
Client education and behavior change communication, Malaria
